welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lake Villa, a charming city known for its serene lakes and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore and experience all that this lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Memorial Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight operations at Memorial Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
